title: SCP-3922

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a house to Raid at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When Raiding a house, you detain all visitors. Detained visitors are roleblocked the night after you detain them.
- You will learn the names and roles of people you detain.
- Visitors will not know they were detained.
- You are immune to rampages at your Raided target's house.
- If you are roleblocking your detained targets, you will gain control and roleblock immunity.
- If you are roleblocking your detained targets, you will not be able to raid.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Prevent the Foundation from recontaining you at all costs.

desc:
Post 3849
*SCP-3922's anomalous capabilities become apparent once placed near a television set or computer. SCP-3922 will alter the content of media, usually through the addition of actors in padded combat uniforms and gas masks desginated SCP-3922-A. SCP-3922-A will impede or punish all crimes committed by the cast, with the severity of the punishment reflecting the MPAA or FCC rating of the video. At the end of every video affected by SCP-3922, an altered end title card will play in the place of any end credits, including the slogan "YOU ARE WATCHED - YOU ARE PROTECTED - YOU ARE LOVED".*
